name: Project Platformer (Bosnian Game Dev)
description:
Note: Please excuse any bugs you may happen to find, I don't get much time for fixing them that often and some I don't even find since it's a prototype

A demo that I prototyped because of an idea that I had where you'd have a limited number of attacks that you can collect through the level and one that constantly recharges.
I only added one boss and no enemies to drive focus to the gameplay loop of platform -> fight -> platform. Ideally, I'd add a few more small enemy obstacles along the way to make the platforming more interesting.

I completed this demo in about a few days and since I work a full-time job this was done in the span of many many days, each day with an hour or two of coding.
